title.rendered: NEWTECONS REUNION AT THE END OF 2019

content.rendered:
As scheduled, at the end of the year, the Newtecons Family gathered together at the Company Office to meet and attend lucky draw event to receive gifts for Lunar New Year.

Leaving aside the chaos, hustle and bustle, all officers and employees of Newtecons enjoyed meaningful moments today. The time to welcome Lunar New Year Canh Ty is near, and we wish all officers and employees of Newtecons a Happy Lunar New Year filled with Peace and Love.

Some images at the program:
